Detailed Description

Sentence saves the results of Chinese morphological analysis.

Sentence saves the results of Chinese morphological analysis. Typically, the usage is like below:

Sentence s; s.setString("...");

Analyzer* analyzer = ...; analyzer->runWithSentence(s);

// get n-best results for(int i=0; i<s.getListSize(); ++i) { for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j) { const char* pLexicon = s.getLexicon(i, j); const char* strPOS = s.getStrPOS(i, j); ... } double score = s.getScore(i); ... }

// get one-best result int i= s.getOneBestIndex(); ...
